page.title: 05HOUSING
page.content: A large majority of the houses are council owned.Most people have lived in the area most of their lives moving to different houses because of the slum clearance.But because the council has been selling off houses recently many people have been buying their homes.Most people who live in the the area do so because of tradition and family connections and there would appear to be a reluctance to move despite the problems created by the decline of heavy industries and the drastic reduction in employment opportunity.Many people like to live around the area because of its quiet natural surroundings,or its proximity to the seaside.Many people do not have garages but the council rent them.Many houses have central heating. A large majority have gardens.The older people have meals on wheels.
